top_comments.comment: Cases are going down for the same reason they went down after the first wave. Delta rolled through, infected tons of people, then the cases went down. It's the exact same thing that will happen when the next variant rolls through.

I'm afraid in some cities, masks will never go away, because, Hey, after all, its the safe and nice thing to do. Eventually I will literally move outta Los Angeles just because of the masks. I hate them so much
